statements: SELECT * FROM greenhouse_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, temperature FROM greenhouse_data WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT sensor_id, humidity FROM greenhouse_data WHERE sensor_id = 5 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, timestamp FROM greenhouse_data WHERE humidity < 50 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM greenhouse_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-06-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT id, temperature, humidity FROM greenhouse_data WHERE sensor_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM greenhouse_data WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 70 ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT id, timestamp, temperature FROM greenhouse_data WHERE humidity > 80 ORDER BY temperature DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT id, humidity FROM greenhouse_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-01-31' ORDER BY id
SELECT * FROM greenhouse_data ORDER BY sensor_id, timestamp DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT device_id, temperature, humidity, timestamp FROM greenhouse_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM device_info WHERE location='Greenhouse A'
SELECT device_id, device_name, location FROM device_info WHERE last_connection > '2022-01-01'
SELECT AVG(temperature), MAX(humidity) FROM greenhouse_data
SELECT * FROM greenhouse_data WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY device_id ASC
SELECT * FROM greenhouse_data WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_id, temperature, humidity FROM greenhouse_data WHERE humidity < 60 AND temperature < 30 ORDER BY humidity ASC, timestamp DESC;

SELECT device_id, device_name, location, temperature, humidity FROM greenhouse_data JOIN device_info ON greenhouse_data.device_id = device_info.device_id WHERE location = 'Greenhouse 1' AND timestamp BETWEEN '2021-10-01' AND '2021-10-31';

SELECT AVG(temperature) AS avg_temperature, MIN(humidity) AS min_humidity, MAX(humidity) AS max_humidity FROM greenhouse_data WHERE timestamp > '2021-12-01' GROUP BY device_id HAVING avg_temperature > 20;

SELECT device_id, device_name, temperature, humidity, timestamp, location FROM greenhouse_data INNER JOIN device_info ON greenhouse_data.device_id = device_info.device_id WHERE temperature > 20 AND humidity < 70 ORDER BY device_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM greenhouse_devices;
SELECT name, location FROM greenhouse_devices WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT device_id, timestamp, temperature FROM temperature_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_id, MAX(humidity) AS max_humidity FROM humidity_data GROUP BY device_id;
SELECT location, COUNT(device_id) AS device_count FROM greenhouse_devices GROUP BY location HAVING device_count > 2;
SELECT * FROM greenhouse_devices WHERE status = 'active' ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT device_id, location FROM greenhouse_devices WHERE status = 'inactive';
SELECT device_id, temperature FROM temperature_data WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT device_id, name, humidity FROM greenhouse_devices JOIN humidity_data ON greenhouse_devices.device_id = humidity_data.device_id WHERE humidity < 60;
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM greenhouse_devices ORDER BY location;
SELECT * FROM GreenhouseDevices
SELECT device_name, location FROM GreenhouseDevices ORDER BY device_name ASC
SELECT device_id, location FROM GreenhouseDevices WHERE current_status = TRUE
SELECT * FROM TemperatureData WHERE temperature_value > 25
SELECT device_id, MAX(temperature_value) AS max_temperature FROM TemperatureData GROUP BY device_id
SELECT * FROM GreenhouseDevices WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT device_id, location FROM GreenhouseDevices ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT device_name, temperature_value FROM GreenhouseDevices JOIN TemperatureData ON GreenhouseDevices.device_id = TemperatureData.device_id;
SELECT device_name, humidity_value FROM GreenhouseDevices JOIN HumidityData ON GreenhouseDevices.device_id = HumidityData.device_id WHERE humidity_value > 60;
SELECT device_id, alert_type, message FROM GreenhouseDevices JOIN Alerts ON GreenhouseDevices.device_id = Alerts.device_id ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM greenhouse ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT device_id, temperature, humidity FROM greenhouse WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT id, name, location FROM device WHERE location LIKE '%Garden%';
SELECT * FROM user WHERE email = 'john.doe@example.com';
SELECT id, alert_type, timestamp FROM alert ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, temperature FROM greenhouse WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY temperature DESC LIMIT 10;

SELECT device.name, device.location, greenhouse.temperature FROM device JOIN greenhouse ON device.id = greenhouse.device_id WHERE greenhouse.temperature < 20 ORDER BY device.name, greenhouse.temperature;
SELECT user.username, user.email, log.action FROM user LEFT JOIN log ON user.id = log.id WHERE log.timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT device.name, COUNT(alert.id) AS num_alerts FROM device LEFT JOIN alert ON device.id = alert.device_id GROUP BY device.name HAVING num_alerts > 5 ORDER BY num_alerts DESC;

SELECT device.name, AVG(greenhouse.temperature) AS avg_temperature FROM device JOIN greenhouse ON device.id = greenhouse.device_id GROUP BY device.name HAVING avg_temperature > 25 ORDER BY avg_temperature DESC;
